Uses of Package
com.indeed.status.core

  • Classes in com.indeed.status.core used by com.indeed.status.core 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDependency
    The AbstractDependency provides a convenience base class for implementers of the Dependency interface.
    AbstractDependency.Builder 
    AbstractDependencyBuilder
    Deprecated. 
    Use AbstractDependency.Builder directly

    This class overrides all public mutators on the the parent class so that the method signatures match their pre-deprecated versions.

    TODO Remove by 2017-01-01
    CheckMethod
    The CheckMethod represents a combination between a Callable<CheckResult> and a Function<Dependency, CheckResult>.
    CheckResult
    The CheckResult represents the outcome of a single dependency check.
    CheckResult.Builder 
    CheckResult.Thrown 
    CheckResultSet
    The CheckResultSet is a mutable aggregator collecting the results of individual dependency evaluations into a single object describing the current health of the overall system.
    CheckResultSet.Builder 
    CheckResultSet.SystemReport 
    CheckResultSystemReport
    it's a marker interface intended to be implemented by json-serializable objects that will comprise the status report.
    CheckStatus 
    Dependency
    A Dependency represents a single system, service, or state that the current running JVM process depends on.
    DependencyExecutor 
    DependencyPinger
    The DependencyPinger is a modification of the HCv2 ServicePinger class that keeps the idea of consecutive failures and slowly downgrading status, but uses abstractions from the HCv3 system.
    DependencyType
    An interface for the enum class that describes which type the Dependency is.
    DependencyType.StandardDependencyTypes
    An implementation of the interface DependencyType for standard systems.
    Documented
    Interface implemented by classes that have published documentation accessible via URL.
    PingableDependency
    The PingableDependency represents the simplest of dependencies, a dependency that executes and either completes or throws an Exception.
    PingableDependency.Builder 
    PingableDependencyBuilder
    Deprecated. 
    Use PingableDependency.Builder directly This class overrides all public mutators on the the parent class so that the method signatures match their pre-deprecated versions. TODO Remove by 2017-01-01
    PingMethod
    The PingMethod encapsulates a snippet of executable code that either runs to completion or fails with an exception.
    SimpleDependency
    The SimpleDependency represents the most common form of dependency with a tiered result level.
    SimpleDependency.Builder 
    SimplePingableDependency
    Simple pingable dependency that determines health status by evaluating an injected PingMethod that either runs to completion or throws an exception.
    SimplePingableDependency.Builder
    Simple concrete extension of the pingable dependency builder to collapse the parameterized types and avoid telescoping type definitions.
    StatusUpdateListener
    Callbacks which receive notification of changes to dependencies.
    StatusUpdateProducer 
    SystemReporter 
    Urgency
